name: Mohammad Rahman
review: Excellent course! Covered all basics thoroughly. Enjoyed the interactive learning experience. Highly recommend.

name: Sadia Islam
review: Informative content, but could be more hands-on. Instructor was knowledgeable. Overall, a good learning experience.

name: Abdul Aziz
review: Found the strategies practical and effective. Could use more real-life examples. Good value for the price.

name: Farhana Ahmed
review: Absolutely loved the creative projects. Instructor was engaging. Would love more advanced tutorials in the future.

name: Rahim Khan
class_title: Mobile App Development with React Native
review: Challenging but rewarding course. Helped me build my first app. Clear instructions. Recommend for aspiring developers.

name: Nadia Begum
review: Informative for beginners. More practical assignments would be appreciated. Good instructor engagement.
